data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Van der Palm cruise from Shanghai to Macao started at 1848-12-09
Ship: Van Der Palm, Voyage: Shanghai - Macao, 1st Observer: J.J. Muntendam (Kapitein)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
